artist: Artist: Fritz Scholder; Printer: Tamarind Institute, Albuquerque, New Mexico
creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: stylized image of horse and rider in bright colors; background is orange at bottom fading into blue at top with green tones between; horse is red, blue and yellow, with a primarily yellow shadow; rider is primarily red with some yellow; red splattery spots in an arc from middle of right edge through horse's chest and between its PR legs
markings: LLC, in pencil: [20.50]; LLC, impressed in paper: [(symbol--?)]; bottom center, impressed in paper: [FS]; LRC, impressed in paper: [(bird\'s head--?)]
title: Indian on Galloping Horse After Remington #2 (Second State)
